players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, are you the detective?"
You: "No, I am not the detective. I was just here, not involved in any investigations."
Charlie: "Bob, I investigated you last night and found you are mafia. You lied earlier. I'm sure you are the killer."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is the mafia. He lied. Diana, you are innocent. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, your denial contradicts Charlie's claim; I think you're mafia. Vote Bob."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, are you the detective?"
Bob: "No, I am not the detective. I was just here, not involved in any investigations."
You: "Bob, I investigated you last night and found you are mafia. You lied earlier. I'm sure you are the killer."
You: "I am the detective. Bob is the mafia. He lied. Diana, you are innocent. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, your denial contradicts Charlie's claim; I think you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
